message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm only willing to pay up to $90 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $90 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $95. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make a deal!
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still not able to go above $88 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
